context: A suspected DCSync attack was reported involving account Luciano Herrera (CIO) who, on host MB-WINCLIENT, sent a replication request to MB-DC1 on 2024-07-10. As part of this incident, an injected process indicates the presence of potentially malicious code.
question: What is the Security Identifier (SID) associated with the injected process reported in the alert regarding potential malicious code?
solution_steps: The account with SID `S-1-5-21-551436448-9871687716-9837441745-1903` was involved in a suspected DCSync attack, sending a replication request to MB-DC1.
The account with SID `S-1-5-21-561436748-3867387497-1732241745-3701` was involved in a process being injected with potentially malicious code.
